readable.title: 2714674623_8cd05ac114
readable.content: a large man dozes off on the bus . A man with a black shirt that says " Genetic Freak " is sleeping on a bus . Man wearing hat and t-shirt with " Genetic Freak " sleeping on public transportation . The heavy man is sitting on a bus and sleeping . Three people , one wearing a t-shirt and baseball cap , are seated on a bus .
